title: Simply Gluten Free and Vegan
description: Carol Kicinski, one of America's top gluten free bloggers, brings you recipes that are not just gluten free...but vegan too!In Simply Gluten Free and Vegan you get recipes for appetizers, main dishes and desserts - all gluten free and all vegan. Recipes for delicious, moist cupcakes and creamy pastas are just a few of the foods you can expect to see in this cookbook.Carol's goal is to make dishes that are not just "good for gluten free," but are just plain GOOD. Period! The same can be said for her vegan recipes, so even meat eaters will be craving these recipes!So whether you are vegan, vegetarian or just want to add a few meatless recipes to your meals, this book is sure to satisfy.
author: Carol Kicinski
